title: authors
mv_disease_sep_2018_density_exp: Amy Kendig, Christopher Wojan, Penny Reif

title: location
mv_disease_sep_2018_density_exp: Big Oaks National Wildlife Refuge, Madison, IN, USA

title: plot
mv_disease_sep_2018_density_exp: experimental plot, which corresponds to planting treatment (1 - 10)

title: sp
mv_disease_sep_2018_density_exp: species (Ev = Elymus virginicus, Mv = Microstegium vimineum)

title: ID
mv_disease_sep_2018_density_exp: plant ID (A = focal adult, 1 - 3 = focal seedlings, other = background)

title: leaves_tot
mv_disease_sep_2018_density_exp: number of leaves on a tiller

title: leaves_infec
mv_disease_sep_2018_density_exp: number of leaves with at least two lesions on that same tiller
